local_schema.short_desc: Whether we should smooth the data in the graph
local_schema.longdesc: Whether we should smooth the data in the graph.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether we should show the events in the statistics window
local_schema.longdesc: Whether we should show the events in the statistics window.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether we should show the axis labels in the statistics window
local_schema.longdesc: Whether we should show the axis labels in the statistics window.

local_schema.short_desc: The default graph type to show in the statistics window
local_schema.longdesc: The default graph type to show in the statistics window.

local_schema.short_desc: The maximum time displayed on the graph
local_schema.longdesc: The maximum duration of time displayed on the x-axis of the graph.
